title: H2 I2 HI - what is produced comparing Q and K

content.prompt:
H2(g) + I2(g) \(\rightleftharpoons\) 2 HI(g)

Kc = 50. at 600°C

Equimolar samples of each of three gases, H2(g), I2(g), and HI(g) , are introduced into a 3.0 L container that is heated to 600°C. According to the information above, which of the following will occur as the system approaches equilibrium?

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
